title: Steal, Then Just Escape: The Real Thrill
description: Experience the Real Thrill. Start out on an exciting adventure where excitement and horror combine.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Experience the Real Thrill.
<!--text-->
A monster dragged you down to its world. Then he gave you a chance to steal his gold, but there were many monsters hovering at every level you faced. Steal the gold, then kill the monsters that are trying to take their leaders gold. Then escape through a series of levels of adventure and different kinds of monsters to enjoy killing.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-1lc0e](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-1lc0e.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Main Lobby
<!--text-->
This is the main lobby. You can choose either a classic game or a speed run game. You can check the rules, credits, and settings in the top right.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-bwqxt](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-bwqxt.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Choose Characters
<!--text-->
Choose to play as a Rafael, Lucio or Janelle. You can only choose one player for signed account.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-1a55i](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-1a55i.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Controller Configuration
<!--text-->
Go to "Key Bindings to chack the controller configurations. "XBOX controller is the only compatible controller yet.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-125i3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-125i3.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The Gold
<!--text-->
The Gold that you will steal but there are some monsters that will chase you and will take the gold back to them.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-1lnbv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-1lnbv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Monsters
<!--text-->
Here is one of the monsters that you will see in the game. This monster is the most common among them all. I prepared almost 100 monsters of seven different types. You will enjoy running from them.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-1uovu](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-1uovu.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The Maze
<!--text-->
The Maze is the most hardest level of my game. But here is the copy of the maze because RTS love giving some clue. RTS made a maze that has only 90% chance of escaping, but there is a short cut RTS designed for you to find and escape.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-xnim8](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-xnim8.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Improved Inventory Tab
<!--text-->
You're able to put your items in the inventory. Examples: your ammos; food; water; skeletons; pots; and also the gold nugget.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-kxy3j](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-kxy3j.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Pause the Game
<!--text-->
You can pause the game anytime and anywhere. Once paused, you can open the options, save the game, and resume playing.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-1ydrq](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-1ydrq.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Audio
<!--text-->
If the game gets too scary, you can adjust the music background and sound effects.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-8s0lq](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-8s0lq.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Statistics
<!--text-->
Your movements are recorded on the statistics tab. When you walk, run, kill enemies, and many more, these are all recorded in statistics.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-qhszl](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-qhszl.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Graphics
<!--text-->
Adjust the game's graphics settings: Low, Medium, High, Very High, and Ultra High. You can change the window mode and resolution. Donâ€™t forget to save your changes.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-1q7u9](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-1q7u9.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Key Bindings
<!--text-->
If you're uncomfortable with your current key bindings, you can change them in the key bindings settings. You have both primary and secondary key binding options.

<!--image-->
![Steal Then Just Escape-az3ka](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ca3efd1bce1344b69070ecc8da8f585d/steal-then-just-escape-az3ka.png)
